com.jrefinery.chart.combination
Interface CombinableAxis

All Known Implementing Classes:
CombinedHorizontalNumberAxis, CombinedHorizontalSymbolicAxis, CombinedVerticalNumberAxis, CombinedVerticalSymbolicAxis, CombinedHorizontalDateAxis
public interface CombinableAxis

Interface implemented by all CombinedXXXXXAxis classes. These classes are used by CombinedPlots to display/hide common axes used by inner charts.

Method Summary
 Axis getParentAxis()
          Returns the parent axis.
 AxisRange getRange()
          Returns the range (minimum and maximum) for the axis.
 boolean isVisible()
          Is this axis visible? Is is drawn?
 void setRange(AxisRange range)
          Sets the range (minimum and maximum) recursively for all sub-plots.
 void setReserveDimension(double dimension)
          The CombinedPlot will calculate the maximim of all reserveWidth or reserveHeight depending on the type of CombinedPlot and inform all CombinedXXXXXAxis to store this value.
 void setVisible(boolean flag)
          Sets the visible flag on or off for this combined axis.
 

Method Detail

getParentAxis

public Axis getParentAxis()
Returns the parent axis.

getRange

public AxisRange getRange()
Returns the range (minimum and maximum) for the axis.

setRange

public void setRange(AxisRange range)
Sets the range (minimum and maximum) recursively for all sub-plots. This is done after a CombinedPlot has calculated the overall range of all CombinedAxis that share the same Axis for all Plots. This makes all plots display the complete range of their Datasets.
Parameters:
range - The range.

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean flag)
Sets the visible flag on or off for this combined axis. A visible axis will display the axis title, ticks and legend depending on the parent's attributes. An invisible axis will only display gridLines if needed.
Parameters:
flag - New value of flag

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Is this axis visible? Is is drawn?

setReserveDimension

public void setReserveDimension(double dimension)
The CombinedPlot will calculate the maximim of all reserveWidth or reserveHeight depending on the type of CombinedPlot and inform all CombinedXXXXXAxis to store this value.
Parameters:
dimension - If the axis is vertical, this is width. If axis is horizontal, then this is height
